about_the_game:
Game Introduction

"Ai Vpet" is an innovative AI virtual desktop pet software. It breaks through the limitations of traditional desktop pets. Through deep learning and natural language processing techniques, it provides users with a knowledgeable and articulate AI companion. Users can choose and customize various character models according to their own preferences, including clothing, pets, personalities, and voices, to create a completely personalized virtual partner. It provides quiet companionship when users need to focus on work, or initiatively initiates interaction during breaks to increase the interestingness of work. "Ai Vpet" is not just a desktop decoration, but also an all-round AI friend that can provide emotional sustenance, knowledge learning, and life entertainment.

Product features


1. The advanced AI technology enables you to customize every detail of the character, from the character image to the personality, clothing to the voice, to create a Wise Friend that is exclusively for you.


2. The AI emotional companion function of "Guardian and Wise Friend" is like a real friend, always ready to chat with you and make you no longer lonely.


3. Create a paradise for Live2D enthusiasts, with a large number of resources for you to choose from, from characters to pets, voices to IPs, and freely match to create a personalized matching experience.


4. Adopting the industry-leading Live2D technology, every character is as vivid as a work of art, with extremely smooth movements, an ultimate visual feast that is so beautiful that it makes people's hearts flutter.


5. The model upload tool meets the needs of different users. Whether you are a novice or an expert, you can easily control and quickly complete the model setting and uploading.

Hearts of the production team

We deeply understand that an excellent desktop assistant is not merely a tool, but an indispensable partner in your digital life. The birth of "Guardian and Smart Friend" is our persistence and pursuit of this concept. We promise to continuously update and improve to meet your needs and expectations. Every piece of feedback and every suggestion is our driving force to move forward. We cherish your voice because we know that without your support and participation, "Guardian and Smart Friend" would not be so vivid and perfect.

In this fast-paced era, we hope that "Guardian and Smart Friend" can bring you a touch of tranquility and convenience. We are committed to making your desktop assistant unique through personalized customization, becoming an extension of your personality. We believe that through AI interactive chatting, it can not only help you manage daily tasks, but also become an interesting and intelligent conversation partner in your life.

We thank you for choosing "Guardian and Smart Friend" as your desktop assistant. We look forward to continuously exploring and creating with you, making "Guardian and Smart Friend" the most shining star on your desktop.

Please follow us

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 或同等级别
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 或以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 或同等级别
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM 或以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
